evidence: While the best F-measure recorded on a test set selected from the training corpus ( WSJ ) was 80percent , on the Brown corpus , the F-measure dropped below 70percent .
text: While the best F-measure recorded on a test set selected from the training corpus ( WSJ ) was 80percent , on the Brown corpus , the F-measure dropped below 70percent .

claim_evidence: The results indicate that our model is an interesting step towards the design of free-text semantic parsers
